channel.title: Keep transforming into hans

item.title: Keep transforming into hans
item.dc:creator: @zzjimmy zzjimmy
item.description:
@zzjimmy wrote:

I wrote this code wich should have allowed me to turn into a barbarian when I put the ring of charos on. And no i didn’t get the wrong ncp ID because when i spawn the npc, its a barbarian…anyways heres the code…

if(wearID == 4202) { npcId = 12; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

EDIT: i tried different npcs and they all turn into Hans!!! why him???
somebody please help

Read full topic
